title: Alexander Ludwig (footballer, born 1984)
summary: Alexander Ludwig (born 31 January 1984) is a German former professional footballer who played as a midfielder.Ludwig began his career with Hertha BSC, making four Bundesliga appearances, before joining Dynamo Dresden in August 2005. He moved to FC St. Pauli in 2007 after they beat Dynamo to promotion, and left for TSV 1860 Munich two years later.
